article_title: Feds recover $2.4 billion from health care fraud
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

The U.S. government is happy to let you know that it recovered $2.4 billion in 2015 from health care fraudsters.

Granted, it doesn't make up for the amount the U.S. spends a year on unused cancer medication, but it’s a pretty penny nonetheless.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jack Craver
article_metadata.description: The U.S. government is in the lookout for fraudulent health care providers.
